short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of helpful tools running locally

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Several helpful tools running entirely locally with optional encryption. Tools include additional clipboard paste-bins, pass phrase generator, snippets storage, page notes, html and regex testers, and more. 

Popup Tools: 
Clipboard - There are five inputs that you can set in the popup and will be able to copy the values using keyboard shortcuts you can configure in the extension settings. Encrypted by default. 
Pass Phrase Generator - A customizable pass phrase generator that produces in formats as diverse as "Game-Mars-24" and "ENCOURAGED:EDITORIAL"
Snippets - Save key/value pairs and easily search for them. This can be useful for commonly used text snippets outside of those saved in Clipboard. Encryption available. 
Cookies - A basic cookie view and editor. It does easily allow deleting all the cookies for a specific site. 

Sidebar Tools:
Page Notes - You can save a private note using the current url (uses a configurable regex pattern) and reference it next time you visit that page. Encryption available.
Site Settings - Easily modify site settings without changing windows. You can turn off JavaScript or cookies for a site and more. 
Requests - Similar to the network function of the browser's inspect section but not so busy and allows conversion of a request to a python script.  

Options (Tab view) Tools: 
HTML Sandbox - You can type in HTML/CSS and it will preview live
Regex Tester - You can type regex and set items to pass or fail. 
Regex Find and Replace - Allows you to find regex patterns and replace them with specific text. 
References - some common references you can access offline and edit as needed if you connect your Google account. 
Script - a JavaScript page allowing the user to specify functions to run on certain pages or every page they visit (developer mode must be turned on to see this)
